pageContext.claim: “Can you imagine if these Do Nothing Democrat Savages, people like Nadler, Schiff, AOC Plus 3, and many more, had a Republican Party who would have done to Obama what the Do Nothings are doing to me. Oh well, maybe next time!”
pageContext.analysis: Republicans spent years attacking and stymying the Obama administration, but Obama never used the term "savages" in criticizing Jewish, Hispanic, Muslim and African American political opponents, as Trump does in these remarks.
